column3: Tangential: Would be awesome to have a lint-er that checked these kinds of things: LogPrint[f]/strprintf number of arguments versus number of %, line breaks (although there are cases where you explicitly don't want them, but I they could be marked insome way).\n
Oops, yes, this was a backport\n
Are you sure this is correct? I think this was supposed to be un-terminated, because other message-related commands continue the logging.\n
I remember I saw at least one instance which was wrong but I can't recall which one as I have deleted the `debug.log` in the meantime. I have reverted for now and will look into this later.\n
